column5: Hello everyone,my previous virus protection subscription has expired,and from talking to the puter expert at our school,he told me to install AVG for free,i am also with rogers internet and have ads gone,adaware se profesional,also firewall,so he told me to get avg,and it works better than all the rest,and its free, he said to stay away from norton,and mcaffe,as they slow you down alot,i had pc-cillin virus protection,and it seemed to be ok,and was installed by a member on our board,but when it ran out i was to get a new virus protection,so it would be nice if someone could send me the link so i can install it and feel safer,surfing and watching fish-porn !!!!!!.....thanks in advance
AVG Download here  Here you go .....any trouble, call me at home  bly
I have some trouble..can I call you at home bly? When is Cliff at work?
Anytime Rick and don't worry about Cliff being home or not, he never pays attention when I am on the phone
Good choice, I used to have Norton and then McAfee and switched to AVG for my personal computers. AVG plus Spyware Blaster and Ad Aware and you should be good to go.  Mike

Norton is free for Rogers users. I've gone form my Outlook to the Roger Yahoo mail, and I've never had a problem, nor do I get much SPAM. Just make sure to modify your preferences if you use the Roger's Yahoo mail.  Good luck!
I also use AVG and very happy with it. It automatically check for updates as well so very effective against new threats.
i have used AVG for 3 yrs now... love it... i also run .. .Spy Bot.... GREAT TOOL and does not bog puter down either ..

One of the better antivirus software out there is Kaspersky.  I had avg last couple of months and got a bug on my msn messenger and it didnt even detect it. Went bback to Kaspersky and found a trojan downloader on my hard drive.
